name: Midnight Horror School
storyline: With the sound of the bell at midnight, the school becomes the appearance of midnight .... Things that children forgot at daytime school ... "Chibita Pencil" "Forgotten Umbrella", etc. ... They are a phenomenon called "the seven wonders of the world" created by the graduates of Midnight Horror School, for example, Mystery Sir I am studying "wonder" every day to create my own "mystery" by ading the Glyphs of Kul and Nazca. The story of unique and mysterious little ghosts can be enjoyed on popular DVDs, CS broadcasts (Animax), etc.
summary: The adventure game of "Midnight Horror School" is now available, based on the 3DCG anime of the same name! It is a full-fledged adventure game with a three-person party system where the main character "Hickey" solves the mystery with his friends. "Hickey" will select two of his friends according to the situation and organize a party to solve the mystery that occurs at school. Let's find friends who have become "entity" (tools and things) and revive the characters (falling in the school) and find a way to save the school. While conveying the atmosphere and charm of the original work, such as quoting episodes from the original and conversations between characters, we offer the fun of solving mysteries as a game.
